content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE on Prime Video 4: Abbasov vs. Lee*** (also known as ***ONE Fight Night 4***) was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on November 19, 2022 at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The organization originally targeted a return to [Ryōgoku Kokugikan](/wiki/Ry%C5%8Dgoku_Kokugikan) in [Tokyo](/wiki/Tokyo), Japan to host the event. However, the event was moved to [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) after announced the main event. A [ONE Welterweight World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Welterweight_World_Championship) bout between current champion Kiamrian Abbasov and current [ONE Lightweight World Champion](/wiki/ONE_Lightweight_World_Championship) [Christian Lee](/wiki/Christian_Lee_(fighter)) (also [2019 ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2019_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Lightweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) headlined the event. At the weigh-ins, Abbasov weighed in at 186.25 pounds, 1.25 pounds over the limit. As a result, Abbasov was stripped of the title and only Lee was eligible to win it. A [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Flyweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Rodtang Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Rodtang_Jitmuangnon) and current [ONE Strawweight Muay Thai Champion](/wiki/ONE_Strawweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) [Joseph Lasiri](/wiki/Joseph_Lasiri) took place at the event. A middleweight bout between former [ONE Middleweight](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Middleweight_World_Championship) and [Light Heavyweight World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Light_Heavyweight_World_Championship) [Aung La Nsang](/wiki/Aung_La_Nsang) and former UFC and WSOF Middleweight title contender [Yushin Okami](/wiki/Yushin_Okami) was expected to take place at the event. However, the bout was moved to [ONE 163](/wiki/ONE_163) on same day. A bantamweight bout between [Kwon Won Il](/wiki/Kwon_Won_Il) and Mark Abelardo was scheduled to take the event. However, on November 4, it was announced that the bout will be moved to [ONE 163](/wiki/ONE_163). At the weigh-ins, [Bibiano Fernandes](/wiki/Bibiano_Fernandes), [Stephen Loman](/wiki/Stephen_Loman) and [Jonathan Haggerty](/wiki/Jonathan_Haggerty) all failed hydration test and were forced to take catchweights. Fernandes weighed in at 151.5 lbs, 6.5 pounds over the limit, Loman came in at 153.25 lbs, 8.25 lbs over the bantamweight limit, and Haggerty at 148 lbs, 3 pounds over the limit. The bout proceeded at catchweight with Haggerty being fined 20% of his purse, which went to his opponent Vladimir Kuzmin. Fernandes and Loman scheduled to meet but to both were unable to make weight in the bantamweight (135 – 145 lbs) and the bout agreed to 153.25 lbs catchweight. ## Results Main card (Amazon Prime Video)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesCatchweight (186.25 lbs)[Christian Lee](/wiki/Christian_Lee_(fighter))def.Kiamrian AbbasovTKO (elbows and punches)44:20[a]Flyweight Muay Thai[Rodtang Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Rodtang_Jitmuangnon) (c)def.[Joseph Lasiri](/wiki/Joseph_Lasiri)Decision (unanimous) (50–43, 50–43, 50–43)53:00[b]Catchweight (153.25 lbs)[Stephen Loman](/wiki/Stephen_Loman)def.[Bibiano Fernandes](/wiki/Bibiano_Fernandes)Decision (unanimous)35:00[c]Welterweight Muay Thai[Cosmo Alexandre](/wiki/Cosmo_Alexandre)def.Juan CervantesKO (elbow)21:23BantamweightKim Jae Woongdef.[Kevin Belingon](/wiki/Kevin_Belingon)TKO (punches)12:33Lead card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Catchweight (148 lbs) Muay Thai[Jonathan Haggerty](/wiki/Jonathan_Haggerty)def.Vladimir KuzminDecision (majority) (29–28, 29–28, 29–29)33:00[d]WelterweightRuslan Emilbek Uuludef.Isi FitikefuDecision (split)35:00Women's Atomweight Submission Grappling[Danielle Kelly](/wiki/Danielle_Kelly_(grappler))def.Mariia MolchanovaSubmission (rear-naked choke)12:15Lightweight Muay Thai[Liam Nolan](/wiki/Liam_Nolan_(Muay_Thai))def.Eddie AbasoloDecision (unanimous) (30–28, 30–27, 30–27)33:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Christian Lee, Cosmo Alexandre** and **Danielle Kelly** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
